name: Wargroove
description: Take to the battlefield with Wargroove, a strategy game for up to 4 players! Choose your Commander and wage turn-based war on battling factions. Design and share maps, cut-scenes and campaigns with easy-to-use editors and in-depth customization tools!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Core i3 or equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 11 and/or OpenGL 3.3 compatible video card DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 64-bit Processor: Core i5 or equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 11 and/or OpenGL 3.3 compatible video card DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
